lead_paragraph: Afghan government and NATO officials are investigating reports that seven civilians were killed in Helmand Province in a NATO missile strike.
snippet: Afghan government and NATO officials are investigating reports that seven civilians were killed in Helmand Province in a NATO missile strike.

headline.main: Afghans Investigate Reports of More Civilian Deaths
headline.print_headline: Afghans Investigate Reports of More Civilian Deaths

byline.contributor: Sangar Rahimi contributed reporting from Kabul, and an Afghan employee of The New York Times from Helmand Province.
